title: Aetna
shortDescription: Major health insurer offering plans with autism and behavioral health coverage in Florida.
description: Aetna is one of the nation's largest health insurers, offering a variety of health plans in Florida including employer-sponsored, individual, Medicare, and Medicaid managed care options. Aetna plans typically include coverage for autism spectrum disorder services, including Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA), speech therapy, occupational therapy, and mental health services. Coverage details vary by plan, so it's important to verify your specific benefits and any prior authorization requirements.
benefits: Coverage for ABA therapy (varies by plan)
Speech, occupational, and physical therapy benefits
Behavioral health and mental health services
Wide network of providers in Florida
Online tools for finding in-network providers
Care management programs for complex conditions
requirements: Prior authorization often required for ABA and intensive services
Services must be deemed medically necessary
Provider must be in-network for full benefits (in most plans)
Diagnosis of autism spectrum disorder typically required
